hero.name: Simone Colli
hero.subtitle: Computer Science Student & Photographer
hero.description: Master's student in Computer Science passionate about challenging problems, software development, collaborations, and visual storytelling through photography.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: I'm Simone Colli, a Computer Science master's student from Italy who bridges technology and creativity. I build custom software solutions, and express my creativity through photography.

footer.description: Computer Science student passionate about technology, and photography. Always learning, always creating.

projects.pageDescription: A collection of software projects, experiments, and ideas brought to life. Each project represents a step in my journey as a developer.

talks.pageDescription: A collection of academic presentations and talks delivered at the University of Parma. Each presentation represents research, exploration, and knowledge sharing in various computer science domains.

photography.pageDescription: Through my lens, I capture moments, emotions, and stories. Photography is my way of freezing time and creating meaningful memories.
photography.noPhotos: No photos found in this category.

blog.pageDescription: Thoughts on software development, technology, photography and other topics I'm passionate about.

about.bio1: I'm Simone Colli, a Computer Science master's student passionate about building software solutions and exploring creativity through photography. My path combines the analytical rigor of programming with the expressive power of visual storytelling.
about.bio2: Throughout my studies and projects, I have worked on areas ranging from web development and parallel computing to bioinformatics and open-source collaboration. At the same time, photography allows me to capture authentic moments and translate emotions into images.
about.bio3: Based in Italy, I spend my time contributing to collaborative projects, tutoring students, experimenting with new technologies, and telling stories through my camera lens. Years as a competitive athlete have taught me resilience, discipline, and perseveranceâ€”values I now bring into both my academic and creative work.

common.workInProgressMessage: I'm currently working on this section. Check back soon for updates!

personalWebsite.title: Personal website
personalWebsite.description: A personal website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience.

quantumPortfolioOptimization.title: Quantum Portfolio Optimization
quantumPortfolioOptimization.description: A research project focused on optimizing portfolio allocation, enhancing traditional methods for improved risk-return management.

academicGuaranteeOptimization.title: Academic Guarantee Optimization
academicGuaranteeOptimization.description: Answer Set Programming (ASP)-based tool for optimizing the assignment of academic guarantors to university courses.

pandelosPlus.title: PanDelos-plus
pandelosPlus.description: PanDelos-plus: a parallel algorithm for computing sequence homology in pangenomic analysis

deepNeuralNetworkLibrary.title: Deep neural network library
deepNeuralNetworkLibrary.description: Deep Neural Network Library: A flexible C++ library for building, training, and using deep neural networks. Modular, easy-to-use, and high-performance.

uniprOrg.title: Unipr-org
uniprOrg.description: A collaborative GitHub organization that brings together Computer Science students at the University of Parma to create and share a comprehensive collection of course notes, study materials, and academic resources. The platform promotes open collaboration and knowledge sharing, making university learning more accessible for all students.

mazeProject.title: MazeProject
mazeProject.description: An application developed in occasion of the European Researchers' Night 2022. This project involves creating an interactive maze game that educates users about scientific concepts while they navigate through various challenges.

academicPresentationSASVExam.title: Academic presentation for Static analysis and software verification exam
academicPresentationSASVExam.description: A presentation created for the static analysis and software exam at the University of Parma. The presentation talks about a chosen research paper.

academicPresentationBddmExam.title: Academic presentation for Big Data and Data Mining exam
academicPresentationBddmExam.description: A presentation created for the Big Data and Data Mining exam at the University of Parma. The presentation talks about a chosen research paper.

academicPresentationBddmReverse.title: Academic presentation for Big Data and Data Mining reverse class.
academicPresentationBddmReverse.description: A presentation created for the Big Data and Data Mining reverse class at the University of Parma. The presentation talks about synthetic data generation.

academicPresentationCsExam.title: Academic presentation for Cybersecurity exam
academicPresentationCsExam.description: A presentation created for the Cybersecurity exam at the University of Parma. The presentation talks about the infostealers.

academicPresentationFAIExam.title: Academic presentation for Fundamentals of Artificial Intelligence exam
academicPresentationFAIExam.description: A presentation created for the fundamentals of artificial intelligence exam at the University of Parma. The presentation talks about contrastive learning in spatial transcriptomics data.

academicPresentationLIaCExam.title: Academic presentation for Languages, Interpreters and Compilers exam
academicPresentationLIaCExam.description: A presentation created for the languages, interpreters and compilers exam at the University of Parma. The presentation talks about loop unrolling.

0.title: PanDelos-plus preprint
0.description: First author of the paper 'PanDelos-plus: A parallel algorithm for computing sequence homology in pangenomic analysis', released on arXiv.

1.title: Teaching Assistant & Seminars
1.description: Tutor for Operating Systems and Software Engineering courses at University of Parma. Speaker in seminars on tutoring and Python programming with graphical libraries.

2.title: Tutoring under different perspectives
2.description: Delivered the talk 'Il tutorato da diverse prospettive e strumenti informatici a supporto', focusing on methodologies and software tools for academic mentoring.

3.title: BBCC2024 Conference - Naples
3.description: Presented PanDelos-plus at the BBCC2024 conference in Naples.

4.title: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
4.description: Graduated with thesis on a parallel algorithm for pangenomic sequence analysis. Started Master's degree in Computer Science at University of Parma.

5.title: Internship in Bioinformatics
5.description: Developed parallel software for pangenome analysis using C++, Python, and Bash.

6.title: Open Source Collaboration
6.description: Founded and maintained unipr-org, an organization for collaborative open-source projects among university students.

7.title: Freelance Tutor & Photographer
7.description: Tutoring in C, C++, Java, Python, algorithms, and web development. Provided photography services for events.

8.title: MazeProject - Science Outreach
8.description: Created a web application to visualize graph search algorithms for European Researchers' Night.

9.title: Cybersecurity Training
9.description: Completed CyberChallenge.it, a national program in cybersecurity and CTF competitions.

10.title: Artistic Roller Skating Athlete
10.description: Competitive high-level athlete, learning resilience, discipline, and teamwork.
